changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE ruleform.agency_network_authorization ( id bigserial NOT NULL, -- Unique identifier classification bigint NOT NULL, -- In conjunction with the 'classifier' column, the agency that determines the classification criteria for selecting network relationships a certain agency must have classifier bigint NOT NULL, -- In conjunction with the 'classification_attribute' column, determines the classification criteria for selecting network relationships a certain agency must have authorized_parent bigint NOT NULL, -- A network parent an agency is expected to have authorized_relationship bigint NOT NULL, -- A network relationship an agency is expected to have sequence_number ruleform.sequence_number NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, -- Ordering and uniqueness, for when an relationship can have multiple acceptable parent values grouping_agency bigint, -- If present, used to select an entire grouping of agencys for this relationship notes character varying, -- Additional notes regarding this rule research bigint, -- Indicates that this rule needs to be researched or investigated to resolve a potential problem updated_by bigint NOT NULL, -- The agency that last updated this rule update_date timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT ('now'::text)::timestamp(6) with time zone, -- The date this rule was last changed CONSTRAINT agency_network_authorization_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id ), CONSTRAINT agency_network_authorization_authorized_parent_fkey FOREIGN KEY (authorized_parent) REFERENCES ruleform.agency (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT, CONSTRAINT agency_network_authorization_authorized_relationship_fkey FOREIGN KEY (authorized_relationship) REFERENCES ruleform.agency (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT, CONSTRAINT agency_network_authorization_classification_fkey FOREIGN KEY (classification) REFERENCES ruleform.relationship (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT, CONSTRAINT agency_network_authorization_classifier_fkey FOREIGN KEY (classifier) REFERENCES ruleform.agency (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT, CONSTRAINT agency_network_authorization_grouping_agency_fkey FOREIGN KEY (grouping_agency) REFERENCES ruleform.agency (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT, CONSTRAINT agency_network_authorization_research_fkey FOREIGN KEY (research) REFERENCES ruleform.research (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT, CONSTRAINT agency_network_authorization_updated_by_fkey FOREIGN KEY (updated_by) REFERENCES ruleform.agency (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT, CONSTRAINT agency_attribute_authorizatio_agency_classification_attri_key UNIQUE (classification , classifier, authorized_parent, authorized_relationship , sequence_number ) ) WITH ( OIDS=FALSE ); COMMENT ON TABLE ruleform.agency_network_authorization IS 'Defines rules stating what network relationships are authorized for particular agencys'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.agency_network_authorization.id IS
